title: Briggs Says Tech Potential Is `Untapped'
itunes:title: Briggs Says Tech Potential Is `Untapped'
description:
Bill Briggs, Chief Technology Officer at Deloitte, discusses tech trends to look for in 2020. He talks about how technology can understand a users emotional state to gauge how better to connect.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bill Briggs, Chief Technology Officer at Deloitte, discusses tech trends to look for in 2020. He talks about how technology can understand a users emotional state to gauge how better to connect.
